email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Elena,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out to offer a freight rate for 25,000MT of soybeans from Santos to Shanghai on CFR terms. The vessel we propose is the OCEAN HARMONY, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 230m. The laycan is set for 1st to 5th November, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD58.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD56.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the vessel's ETA at Santos?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Elena Martinez
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Elena,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD57.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD15,000 per day, pro rata. The vessel's ETA at Santos is 28th October.

Please note that the laycan remains 1st to 5th November, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD57.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Elena Martinez
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Elena,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on 1st November, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Elena Martinez
Global Freight
